title.narrative: Technical Assistance and Surge Support - Resilience and Emergency Response

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance and Surge Support - Resilience and Emergency Response) is a component of Building Resilience and an Effective Emergency Refugee Response (BRAER) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,001,182. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility, Immediate post-emergency reconstruction and rehabilitation. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 25-06-2018 and the end date is 31-05-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility
